function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Use of thermal imaging for temperature screening","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of iot devices for tracking and surveillance may raise privacy concerns for individuals being monitored.","category":"Security","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Risks of accuracy, safety, protection, and data quality in disease surveillance and control technologies","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Global pandemic infectious disease","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Socio-economic divide affecting housing options and access to home delivery","category":"Wealth Distribution","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Integration of living spaces may increase the risk of disease propagation due to close proximity of individuals","category":"Living","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Internal layout design impacting movement patterns and proximity of people","category":"Living","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Failure to observe social distancing guidelines in communal spaces, leading to potential transmission of contagious diseases.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Socialising in residential spaces may expose occupants to pathogens carried by visitors, including asymptomatic individuals with covid-19.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risk of virus deposits on items and clothing from external spaces","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of compliance with social distancing and hygiene measures","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reduction in air cargo volume and shipping disruptions","category":"Commerce/Trade","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of rethinking human movement patterns in commuter spaces","category":"Transport","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High density of shoppers in supermarkets during a pandemic","category":"Shopping","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid deployment of pop-up facilities for community wide-spread nasal and throat swab testing","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Collaborative learning without social distancing in classrooms","category":"Education","confidence":"High"},{"name":"System failure leading to seeding events into the community","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Failure to contain new strains of sars-cov-2","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Regulated customer numbers in shops may lead to long queues outside, increasing the risk of close contact and transmission of contagious diseases.","category":"Shopping","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High turn-over and customer density models in stores and hospitality venues","category":"Commerce/Trade","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"The promotion of electric vehicles may lead to increased car-based mobility and a decrease in the use of active and public transportation modes.","category":"Transport","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"The use of electric vehicles may contribute to urban sprawl and increased competition with public transport and shared services.","category":"Transport","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential for increased transmission of contagious diseases due to disrupted supply chains and altered social practices.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Enmeshment of smart city technologies with covid-19 management strategies in global south cities","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Tensions between different modes of existence of smart city technologies in pandemic management","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of covtech for pandemic management","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Historical context and legacy of technologies","category":"Heritage","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Community involvement in pandemic management","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of privacy in contact-tracing initiatives","category":"Security","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Opaque development of pandemic management technologies","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unknown impact of technology-enabled pandemic management strategies","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Differing articulation of scales of government impacting smart city architecture","category":"Tools&Apps","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of unified smart city policy in south africa","category":"Tools&Apps","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Decentralization on paper in the context of the smart city mission in india","category":"Tools&Apps","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of privacy in data tracking and monitoring","category":"Security","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of contagious diseases through contact tracing and monitoring","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Misinformation and discrimination in data activism","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Integration of private partnerships in building icccs may lead to security and privacy vulnerabilities.","category":"Security","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on digital platforms for managing urban data may lead to monopolistic control over urban services and data, impacting competition and innovation.","category":"Tools&Apps","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"The implementation of safety and surveillance technologies in smart cities","category":"Security","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of enumeration in informal settlements to support rights claims in terms of service emphasis on the historical trajectory of technical objects in relation to disease outbreaks","category":"Heritage","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reflection on plurality of worlds and truth regimes may lead to conflicting worldviews and social representations.","category":"Culture/Diversity","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate understanding of modern modes of existence and truth regimes
